welcome_text: Welcome to the bot! This bot will monitor popular Ukrainian websites for new vacancies based on your configuration. This is the 0.1.0 version and requires improvements. Use the menu to navigate.
config_creation_title:
Config Creation 🛠️
Create your config by answering 8️⃣ simple questions.
You can cancel config creation at any time by writing /cancel.
config_name_prompt:
1️⃣ / 8️⃣: Name your config (str):
Example: Junior Python Dev
specify_region_prompt:
4️⃣ / 8️⃣: Specify region or remote (str):
Example: Kyiv
search_keywords_prompt:
7️⃣ / 8️⃣: Search keywords, separated by commas (str):
Example: django, flask
display_user_configs:
⚙️ Your configs ⚙️
Select a configuration to view or edit or create a new one
no_config_found_text: ⚙️ No configs found, please create one before running the scraper
scrapper_successfuly_ran: Scraper was successfuly ran for all configs
cfg_no_vacancies_found: No vacancies found for this configuration.
cfg_edit_what_change: What do you want to change?
cfg_edit_you_may_cancel: You may always cancel operation with /cancel command
cfg_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this configuration?
cfgs_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all configurations?
